title: "Hitsville UK" catalogue and poster
content:
Hi, Can anyone help identify the typeface used for the body in this project here

[http://www.company-london.com/print.htm#HitsvilleUK](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202081613/http:/www.company-london.com/print.htm#HitsvilleUK "http://www.company-london.com/print.htm#HitsvilleUK")

and/or suggest anything similar?

Thanks

David

[www.david-gibson.co.uk](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202081613/http:/www.david-gibson.co.uk/ "www.david-gibson.co.uk")
author: David Gibson

comments.content: In case you were looking for that stencil face on the cover -- here's [a selection](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202081613/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontlist/genres/stencil_sans_serif/).
